Sobe.Soba: You are in the room with a pool. Does the pool have something magical inside?
You have entered an empty room. To your left you see a mysterious door.
What is this room? Why are there 3 coffins in here?
Are those chains? Where the hell are you?
This must be a storage room.
This could be a storage room.
You have entered a mysterious room where the ground is broken. Could it contain a secret passage?
This room was someones bedroom. I wonder whose was it?
A workshop. What could you possibly find in a workshop? Maybe some useful tools are laying around.
Someone was playing poker on that table I guarantee it!
A room for the workers to sleep in. What is this a bunker?
Stairs that must lead somewhere.
Just an empty hallway.
There is a bunch of barrels around here. They must have something inside. Hopefully some ale
Stairs that must lead somewhere.
There are a bunch of barrels around. There must be something in them.
Nalazite se u sobi sa bazenom. Ima li bazen nesto magicno u sebi?
Usli ste u praznu sobu. Na Vasoj lijevoj strani se nalaze vrate.
Kakva je ovo Soba? Zasto su ovdje 3 lijesa?
Jesu li to lanci? Gdje ste Vi to?
Ovo mora biti skladiste.
Ovo bi moglo biti skladiste.
Usli ste u misterioznu sobu s razbijenim tlom. Moze li sadrzavati tajni prolaz?
Ova je Soba bila necija spavaca Soba. Pitam se tko je to bio?
Ovo je radionica. Sto biste eventualno mogli pronaci u radionici? Mozda se ovdje nalaze neki alati
Netko je igrao poker za tim stolom, to jamcim!
Soba za spavanje radnika. Je li ovo bunker?
Stepenice koje moraju negdje voditi.
Samo prazan hodnik.
Ovdje ima gomila bacvi. Oni moraju imati nesto unutra. Nadam se pivi!
Stepenice koje moraju negdje voditi.
Okolo je gomila bacvi. Mora nesto biti u njima.
